xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.5 Hetuduka, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika » 1.5.2 Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikapada » 1.5.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
200.
373Hetu asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo hetussa asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
201.
374Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
375Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
376Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
377(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.5.3 Asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikapada >>
